Mobiles.Name: sentinel
Mobiles.Long_Description: A sentinel stands here, guarding some ancient secret.
Mobiles.Description:
This sentinel looks extremely huge and powerful. You wonder how tough he
would be if he weren't holding that weapon of his.

Mobiles.Name: wanderer
Mobiles.Description:
A wanderer is so busy wandering, he ignores your look.  He has spent
many
long years, searching for a way out of here.

Mobiles.Name: sentinel
Mobiles.Long_Description: A sentinel stands here, silently guarding some ancient secret.
Mobiles.Description: This guy is one mean, lean, fighting machine.

Mobiles.Name: sentinel
Mobiles.Long_Description: A sentinel stands here, guarding an ancient secret.
Mobiles.Description: This sentinel is a lean, mean, fighting machine.

Objects.Name: light amulet radiance
Objects.Description: A light amulet of radiance glows.

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The mystic treasure holds the key to the future:  Light will defeat the darkness.
This item brings a curse upon the bearer, as well as the wearer.

Objects.Name: blight sword
Objects.Description: A blight sword has been strewn aside here.

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: A blight sword bring a curse upon the hapless soul who picks it up, or who dares wield it.

Rooms.Name: Corner
Rooms.Description:
You are standing in a corner.  
The marble floors suggest elegance, 
and the walls are a lovely shade of deep red.

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The walls are covered in blood.

Rooms.Name: Portal
Rooms.Description:
You are standing at a gateway.  
The marble floors suggest elegance, 
and the walls are an off-white in color.

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: You notice that nothing is on these walls.
The walls are covered in blood.

Rooms.Name: Entranceway
Rooms.Description:
You are standing at an entranceway.  
You hear death cries coming from within.  
Now is your last chance to turn back.

Rooms.Name: End of the Path
Rooms.Description:
You are standing at the end of the path.  
To the west is an entranceway.  
You faintly hear cries coming from that direction.
